DOC.brief_summary: To perform a clinical validation study of RTVue features in volunteers with various ocular pathology or no ocular pathology.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Validation Study of RTVue Features
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical validation study of RTVue features in volunteers with various ocular pathology or no ocular pathology. Subjects to undergo a clinical exam and OCT scanning.
DOC.criteria: Normal subjects will have normal results from the clinical exam and be free of ocular pathology. Glaucoma patients will have clinical exam results consistent with glaucoma; they will have visual field defects consistent with glaucoma and/or structural damage consistent with glaucoma. Retina patients will have clinical exam results consistent with retina pathology. Normal subjects will be free of any ocular pathology. Glaucoma patients will be free of any ocular pathology except glaucoma. Retina patients will be free of any ocular pathology except any type of retina pathology.
